art.author: cathy
art.post: To Cesar: Akiane did not pray to God to show her what Jesus looked like. She had already seen Jesus many times. Akiane prayed to God for a model that matched the real Jesus that she saw while in Heaven. She stood on street corners, searched in malls, etc, for a long time, then gave up because none of them was the same. When the family finally prayed and asked God to send them the right model, he showed up the next day at their door. No one had told him she was looking for a model. He was looking for work, and was a carpenter..
art.title: More on Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Shroud
